analyzer/src/diagnostics/MCommonOnlineDisplayPlots.cpp

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /********************************************************************\
00002 
00003 Name:         MCommonOnlineDisplayPlots
00004 Created by:   Andrew Edmonds
00005 
00006 Contents:     One module that fills out histograms for the pulse heights, pulse shapes and the raw counts for all digitizer channels. These are all in one module to be more efficient in terms of minimising the number of times we loop through the channels.
00007 
00008 \********************************************************************/
00009

00017 #include <cmath>

00019 /* MIDAS includes */
00020 #include "midas.h"

00023 #include <TH1.h>

00026 /* AlCap includes */
00027 #include "TGlobalData.h"
00028 #include "TSetupData.h"
00029 #include "TPulseIsland.h"

00031 using std::string;
00032 using std::map;
00033 using std::vector;
00034 using std::pair;

00036 /*-- Module declaration --------------------------------------------*/
00037 INT  MCommonOnlineDisplayPlots_init(void);
00038 INT  MCommonOnlineDisplayPlots_bor(INT);

00041 extern HNDLE hDB;
00042 extern TGlobalData* gData;
00043 extern TSetupData* gSetup;
00044 
00045 map <std::string, TH1I*> height_histograms_map;
00046 map <std::string, TH1I*> time_histograms_map;
00047 map <std::string, TH2D*> shape_histograms_map;
00048 map <std::string, TH1I*> latest_pulse_histograms_map;
00049 static TH1I* hPulseRawCount;

00064 
00067 INT MCommonOnlineDisplayPlots_init()
00068 {
00069   // The following histograms are created for each channel:
00070   // hPulseHeights: ADC value (x-axis) vs number of pulses (y-axis)
00071   // hPulseTimes: time stamp (x-axis) vs number of pulses (y-axis)
00072   // hPulseRawCount: number of pulses (y-axis) - channels on x-axis?
00073   // hPulseShapes: sample number (x-axis) vs ADC value (y-axis) vs pulse (z-axis)
00074 
00075   std::map<std::string, std::string> bank_to_detector_map = gSetup->fBankToDetectorMap;
00076   for(std::map<std::string, std::string>::iterator mapIter = bank_to_detector_map.begin(); 
00077       mapIter != bank_to_detector_map.end(); mapIter++) { 
00078 
00079     std::string bankname = mapIter->first;
00080     std::string detname = gSetup->GetDetectorName(bankname);
00081 
00082     int n_digitizer_bits = 0;
00083     if (TSetupData::IsFADC(bankname))
00084       n_digitizer_bits = 12;
00085     else if (TSetupData::IsHoustonCAEN(bankname))
00086       n_digitizer_bits = 14; //?
00087     else if (TSetupData::IsBostonCAEN(bankname))
00088       n_digitizer_bits = 12;
00089     
00090     long max_adc_value = std::pow(2, n_digitizer_bits);
00091 
00092     // hPulseHeights
00093     std::string histname = "h" + bankname + "_Heights";
00094     std::string histtitle = "Plot of the pulse heights in the " + detname + " channels";
00095     TH1I* hPulseHeights = new TH1I(histname.c_str(), histtitle.c_str(), max_adc_value,0,max_adc_value);
00096     hPulseHeights->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Pulse Height [ADC value]");
00097     hPulseHeights->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Number of Pulses");
00098     height_histograms_map[bankname] = hPulseHeights;
00099 
00100     // hPulseTimes
00101     histname = "h" + bankname + "_Times";
00102     histtitle = "Plot of the pulse times in the " + detname + " channels";
00103     TH1I* hPulseTimes = new TH1I(histname.c_str(), histtitle.c_str(), 2000, 0, 2e8);
00104     hPulseTimes->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Time");
00105     hPulseTimes->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Number of Pulses");
00106     time_histograms_map[bankname] = hPulseTimes;
00107 
00108     // hPulseShapes
00109     histname = "h" + bankname + "_Shapes";
00110     histtitle = "Plot of the pulse shapes in the " + detname + " channels";
00111     TH2D* hPulseShapes = new TH2D(histname.c_str(), histtitle.c_str(), 400,-0.5,399.5,max_adc_value+1,0,max_adc_value+1);      
00112     hPulseShapes->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Time Stamp");
00113     hPulseShapes->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("ADC Value");
00114     shape_histograms_map[bankname] = hPulseShapes;
00115 
00116     //hLatestPulse
00117     histname = "h" + bankname + "_LatestPulse";
00118     histtitle = "Plot of the latest pulse in the " + detname + " channels";
00119     TH1I* hLatestPulse = new TH1I(histname.c_str(), histtitle.c_str(), 64,-0.5,63.5);
00120     hLatestPulse->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Time Stamp");
00121     hLatestPulse->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("ADC Value");
00122     latest_pulse_histograms_map[bankname] = hLatestPulse;
00123 
00124   }
00125 
00126   // hPulseRawCount
00127   std::string histname = "hPulseRawCount";
00128   std::string histtitle = "Plot of the raw counts in each channels";
00129   hPulseRawCount = new TH1I(histname.c_str(), histtitle.c_str(), 1,0,1);
00130   hPulseRawCount->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Channel");
00131   hPulseRawCount->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Number of Pulses");
00132   hPulseRawCount->SetBit(TH1::kCanRebin);
00133 
00134   return SUCCESS;
00135 }
00136 
00137 // Resets the histograms at the beginning of each run so that the online display updates
00138 INT MCommonOnlineDisplayPlots_bor(INT run_number) {
00139 
00140   std::map<std::string, std::string> bank_to_detector_map = gSetup->fBankToDetectorMap;
00141   for(std::map<std::string, std::string>::iterator mapIter = bank_to_detector_map.begin(); 
00142       mapIter != bank_to_detector_map.end(); mapIter++) { 
00143   
00144     std::string bankname = mapIter->first;
00145     height_histograms_map[bankname]->Reset();
00146     time_histograms_map[bankname]->Reset();
00147     shape_histograms_map[bankname]->Reset();
00148     latest_pulse_histograms_map[bankname]->Reset();
00149 
00150   }
00151 
00152   hPulseRawCount->Reset();
00153 }
00154 
00158 INT MCommonOnlineDisplayPlots(EVENT_HEADER *pheader, void *pevent)
00159 {
00160         // Get the event number
00161         int midas_event_number = pheader->serial_number;
00162 
00163         // Some typedefs
00164         typedef map<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> > TStringPulseIslandMap;
00165         typedef pair<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> > TStringPulseIslandPair;
00166         typedef map<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> >::iterator map_iterator;
00167 
00168         // Fetch a reference to the gData structure that stores a map
00169         // of (bank_name, vector<TPulseIsland*>) pairs
00170         TStringPulseIslandMap& pulse_islands_map =
00171                 gData->fPulseIslandToChannelMap;
00172 
00173         // Loop over the map and get each bankname, vector pair
00174         for (map_iterator theMapIter = pulse_islands_map.begin(); theMapIter != pulse_islands_map.end(); theMapIter++) 
00175         {
00176           std::string bankname = theMapIter->first;
00177           std::string detname = gSetup->GetDetectorName(bankname);
00178           std::vector<TPulseIsland*> thePulses = theMapIter->second;
00179                         
00180           // Loop over the TPulseIslands and plot the histogram
00181           for (std::vector<TPulseIsland*>::iterator pulseIter = thePulses.begin(); pulseIter != thePulses.end(); pulseIter++) {
00182 
00183             // Make sure the histograms exist and then fill them
00184             // Also check that this pulse didn't underflow (i.e. has a sample value at any point of 4096)
00185             bool underflow = false;
00186             if (shape_histograms_map.find(bankname) != shape_histograms_map.end()) {
00187               TH2* shape_histogram = shape_histograms_map[bankname];
00188               TH1* latest_pulse_histogram = latest_pulse_histograms_map[bankname];
00189               
00190               latest_pulse_histogram->Reset();  
00191               
00192               std::vector<int> theSamples = (*pulseIter)->GetSamples();
00193               for (std::vector<int>::iterator sampleIter = theSamples.begin(); sampleIter != theSamples.end(); sampleIter++) {
00194                 int sample_number = sampleIter - theSamples.begin();
00195                 int sample_value = *sampleIter;
00196 
00197                 if (sample_value == 4096) {
00198                   underflow = true;
00199                   break;
00200                 }
00201                 shape_histogram->Fill(sample_number, sample_value);
00202                 latest_pulse_histogram->SetBinContent(sample_number, sample_value);
00203               }
00204             }
00205 
00206             if (underflow == false) {
00207               if (height_histograms_map.find(bankname) != height_histograms_map.end())
00208                 height_histograms_map[bankname]->Fill((*pulseIter)->GetPulseHeight());
00209 
00210               if (time_histograms_map.find(bankname) != time_histograms_map.end())
00211                 time_histograms_map[bankname]->Fill((*pulseIter)->GetPulseTime());
00212             }
00213           }
00214 
00215           hPulseRawCount->Fill(bankname.c_str(), thePulses.size());
00216         }
00217         return SUCCESS;
00218 }
